Description:
We are looking for a highly motivated and experienced Dynamics 365 Functional Consultant to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of the Dynamics 365 platform, as well as experience in implementing and configuring Dynamics 365 solutions. The Dynamics 365 Functional Consultant will be responsible for a variety of tasks, including:Understanding and documenting customer requirements
Designing and implementing Dynamics 365 solutions
Configuring Dynamics 365 modules
Training users on Dynamics 365
Providing support to users of Dynamics 365Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in computer science, business administration, or a related field
3+ years of experience in Dynamics AX implementation and configuration
Strong understanding of the Dynamics AX platform
Experience in production, warehouse management, and SCM
Experience in digital transformation systems
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
